content: What's the state of the art for switching between branches without having to rebuild mathlib each time? Do I temporarily add build to the git tree and stash it between switches?
lake exe cache pack before switching branches and lake exe cache unpack (or get) afterwards is an option
And you never have to build mathlib because of lake exe cache get
unfortunately i am doing some std bump shenanigans, so i need to rebuild most of mathlib, but I'm trying to do as few full compilations as possible :joy:
